main event: On April 6, 1955, a UFO sighting was reported in Dayton, Ohio involving an object observed for 2-3 minutes.
interesting points: The object was compared to fireworks and identified as a balloon,However, observers simultaneously witnessed an aircraft,The object disappeared gradually and noiselessly,The witness described the object as flat on the bottom, rounded on the top, and metallic grayish in color,The estimated size of the object was 100 ft. by 10 ft.
witness description: A 39-year-old male rocket test operator with specialized training in radio mechanics and aircraft overhaul.
